Package com.cafean.client.ui.swing.accordion

Class DefaultAccordionSelectionModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.ui.swing.accordion.DefaultAccordionSelectionModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccordionSelectionModel
    public class DefaultAccordionSelectionModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements AccordionSelectionModel
    The default implementation of AccordionSelectionModel employed by the Accordion class.

      • setValueIsAdjusting

        public void setValueIsAdjusting​(boolean isAdjusting)
        Description copied from interface: AccordionSelectionModel
        This property is true if several changes are considered a single event. This allows listeners to ignore transitional events until a final event is dispatched with the isAdjusting flag set to false.
        Specified by:
        setValueIsAdjusting in interface AccordionSelectionModel
        Parameters:
        isAdjusting - the new value of this property
